title: "histogram"
format: html
editor: visual

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)

histogram<- read.csv("D:\\何奕萱\\smith\\2024fall\\csc220\\histogram.csv")
```

```{r}
histogram$size <- as.factor(histogram$size)

ggplot(histogram, aes(x = size,
                  y = log(time.ns),
                  color = algo))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(linewidth = 1, aes(group = algo))+
  labs(title = "Time difference between 3 different algorithm",
       x = "Histogram size",
       y = "log(Time/ns)")+
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("10", "100", "1000","10000","100000","1000000"))
```
